        public ResourceAdmin()

    • Method Detail

      • addResource

        public ResourceKey addResource(NewResourceDetails details)
                        throws AppException,
                               DatabaseException,
                               InformationalException
        Adds the resource.

        If the resource content disposition field is empty the the value `inline` will be inserted into this field. The parameter 'modification-date' will be set to current date in the content disposition field.

        Parameters:
        details - The resource details to enter.
        Returns:
        The unique identifier of the newly created application resource record.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature. INFRASTRUCTURE.LOG_ID_RES_TYPE_OR_DISP_INVALID If when adding a resource to the resource store, there was a problem parsing the content disposition.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • readResourceByLikeName

        public ResourceNameIDDetailsList readResourceByLikeName(ResourceName key)
                                                 throws AppException,
                                                        InformationalException
        This method reads a list of resources based on the name passed in. All resources where the name begins with the name passed in will be returned.
        Parameters:
        key - The resource name used to search.
        Returns:
        A list of resources that fully or partially match the name passed in.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception
        InformationalException - Generic Exception.

      • readResourceNameByID

        public ResourceName readResourceNameByID(ResourceKey key)
                                  throws AppException,
                                         InformationalException
        This method reads a single AppResource record based on the resourceID passed in. If the record exists, the resource name is returned, otherwise an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        key - The resourceID for the AppResource record.
        Returns:
        The resource name.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • modifyResource

        public void modifyResource(ResourceKey key,
                           ResourceModifyDetails details)
                    throws AppException,
                           InformationalException
        Modifies the specified resource based on the input criteria. The name and locale of the specified resource cannot be modified.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to uniquely identify the resource record to modify.
        details - The details to be used to modify the resource record with.
        Throws:
        AppException - Exceptions that may occur when modifying a resource record.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

        a list of all of the details of all of the resource records.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

                                                   DatabaseException,
                                                   InformationalException

        Parameters:

        The list of Resources.

      • readResourceByNameAndLocale

        public ResourceByNameAndLocaleDetails readResourceByNameAndLocale(ResourceByNameAndLocaleKey key)
                                                           throws AppException,
                                                                  InformationalException
        Gets a resource with the given name and locale. If the specified resource exists it is returned, otherwise an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        key - The resource name and locale to search for.
        Returns:
        The resource which matches the given name and locale.
        Throws:
        AppException - Exceptions that may be thrown when searching for resources based on resource name and locale.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

        Returns:

        Parameters:
